PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.NAME: Piece of Heaven
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.HEATING: Heating: Electric floor heating with smart thermostat. In very cold weather, use the provided classic wood fireplace. Always use caution, as the house is made of wood. Only use the wood and fire briquettes provided. Never place anything on or near the fireplace.
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.FIREPLACE_STEP1: Place 2 fire briquettes in the fireplace and light them.
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.FIREPLACE_STEP2: Add 3-4 small wood pieces and 2-3 larger ones on top.
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.FIREPLACE_STEP3: Ensure the fire from the briquettes reaches the wood, then close the fireplace door.
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.FIREPLACE_STEP4: Add larger wood pieces as needed to keep the fire going.
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.TERRACE: Terrace & Grill: Small terrace, dedicated gazebo, and stone grill. Bring your own coals for the grill; we provide wood and briquettes to start the fire.
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.SHOWER: Shower Water: Single on/off tap, temperature preset to 38¬∞C.
PIECE_OF_HEAVEN.DOGS: Our Dogs: Please do not feed them (except dog treats). Do not let dogs or cats inside. Keep the small gate closed so dogs do not reach the parking area.

PIECE_OF_DREAM.NAME: Piece of Dream
PIECE_OF_DREAM.FIREPLACE: Fireplace: Automated wood pellet fireplace. Only use the thermostat to control it. Do not open the fireplace door except for cleaning/maintenance. Do not place anything on or near the fireplace. Do not use the console or change settings.
PIECE_OF_DREAM.FILLING: Filling the Fireplace: Fill with wood pellets every 2-3 days (or as needed) only when cold. Pellets are stored in a special compartment on the terrace.
PIECE_OF_DREAM.TERRACE: Terrace & Grill: Relax or grill on the terrace using the gas grill. Use caution with fire and when smoking, as the cabin is made of wood.
PIECE_OF_DREAM.DOGS: Our Dogs: Please do not feed them (except dog treats). Do not let dogs or cats inside. Keep the small gate closed so dogs do not reach the parking area.

OFFROAD.TITLE: Offroad Adventure with Our Suzuki Samurai
OFFROAD.INTRO: Looking for a local offroad experience full of fun, views, and adventure? Join us for an unforgettable ride in our classic 1995 Suzuki Samurai ‚Äî a true offroad legend! We have 3 available seats, and we're happy to stop anytime for photos or to enjoy the scenery.

ROUTE1.TITLE: Route 1 ‚Äî "Hilltop Explorer"
ROUTE1.DESCRIPTION: Starting from our accommodation, we'll drive through a peaceful valley, climb to a scenic hilltop with views over the Bran area, then ride along the ridge overlooking R√¢»ônov and Bra»ôov before returning. This is an easy to medium offroad trail, perfect for families and children old enough to sit safely in a car seat.

ROUTE2.TITLE: Route 2 ‚Äî "Mountain Trail Adventure"
ROUTE2.DESCRIPTION: A more extended route following parts of the Via Transilvanica trail. We'll explore old cart paths, admire the beautiful Bran countryside, drive near the mountain foothills, and then return to our starting point. This is a medium-difficulty offroad trip ‚Äî not recommended for small children.
